subject: Re: RecursiveTestSuite equivalent for JUnit 4?
msgSnippet: ... At least it s supposed to, so I m happy someone can confirm it :-) JUnit 4.5 explicitly kept a constructor that is not needed elsewhere for backwards
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Bradley, Todd" <todd.bradley@...> wrote:
>
> Thank you. ClasspathSuite did exactly what I needed. Also, it seems to
> work fine with JUnit 4.5.

At least it's supposed to, so I'm happy someone can confirm it :-)

JUnit 4.5 explicitly kept a constructor that is not needed elsewhere
for backwards compatibility.

Johannes
